description: This dataset contains health variables gathered from the American Community Survey (ACS) from 2018 to 2022. It includes data related to health insurance coverage at the Census tract level.
source: American Community Survey 5-year data - U.S. Census Bureau

variables.name: without_health_insurance
variables.description: Percentage of the civilian noninstitutionalized population without health insurance coverage

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
